name: Bar Crawls / Pub Crawls
social_dynamics: Moving group energy, strangers becoming friends, shared mission to visit multiple venues, collective decision-making
cultural_notes: Organized or spontaneous. Popular for birthdays, bachelor/bachelorette parties, and tourists exploring nightlife districts. Often includes drink specials at each stop.

name: Expat & Digital Nomad Meetups
social_dynamics: Networking, friendship-seeking, sharing tips about the city, building community away from home
cultural_notes: Lifeline for foreigners in a new city. Often organized through Facebook or Meetup.com. Mix of social and practical - people share advice and make friends.

name: Cultural Events & Festivals
cultural_notes: From Oktoberfest to Day of the Dead to Carnival. These are the heartbeat of local culture. Often annual, deeply traditional, and transformative experiences.

name: Pub Trivia
social_dynamics: Teams competing, mix of focus and socializing, collective brainpower, friendly rivalry
cultural_notes: Weekly tradition in many pubs. Teams have regular names, hosts develop personalities, prizes (often bar tabs) add stakes. Great for regular groups.

name: Structured Dance Lessons
social_dynamics: Learning together, rotating partners, overcoming awkwardness, shared progress
cultural_notes: Salsa, swing, tango, or line dancing. Often includes social dancing after lesson. Great for singles and couples. Builds community over time.

name: Karaoke Night
social_dynamics: Supportive cheering, taking turns, inside jokes forming, liquid courage in effect
cultural_notes: Everyone's a star for 3-5 minutes. Ranges from private rooms (Japan/Korea style) to public stages. Group participation is key - the more people sing, the better.

name: Sports Viewing Party
social_dynamics: Collective emotional journey, strangers high-fiving, group groans at losses, euphoria at wins
cultural_notes: Championship games, local team rivalries, international tournaments (World Cup). Turns a bar into a temporary community of believers. The shared stakes create bonding.

name: Bar Game Tournament
social_dynamics: Friendly competition, brackets, trash talk, regulars competing, new challengers welcome
cultural_notes: Pool, darts, shuffleboard, cornhole, or even Mario Kart. Builds regular community. Winners get bar tab or trophy. Can get surprisingly competitive.

name: Open Mic Night
social_dynamics: Supportive audience, nervous performers, discovery of local talent, intimate vibe
cultural_notes: Where local artists test material. Comedy, music, poetry. You never know if you'll see future stars or glorious failures. Regulars develop over time.
